meanings.definition: The act of sending back or referring to another person or authority.
meanings.sent1: After receiving the package, the renvoi was made to the original sender.
meanings.sent2: The renvoi of the letter was necessary to clarify the instructions.
meanings.sent3: The renvoi of the lost dog to its owner brought smiles all around.
meanings.sent4: Her renvoi to the previous chapter in the book revealed a hidden clue.
meanings.sent5: The renvoi of the student to the principal's office was swift and firm.

meanings.definition: A legal doctrine that allows a court to refer a case to a different court for decision.
meanings.sent1: The renvoi of the complex case to a higher court was a wise decision.
meanings.sent2: The renvoi of the lawsuit to a specialized court ensured a fair judgment.
meanings.sent3: The renvoi of the traffic violation case to a comedy court was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: His renvoi of the legal matter to a chess game analogy was brilliant.
meanings.sent5: The renvoi of the dispute to a mock trial made the process engaging.
